name: A Forward Adventure
description:
If the game doesn't respond to your inputs
just click on the game window to focus it.

A Forward Adventure
Is a short little game where you can only move forwards

X = Forwards
Space = Jump
A = Restart Level

Get to the crown with various of different platform elements in your way
There is a total of 5 platform elements with 15 levels.

Q : Why The Weird Controls ?
A : The Game Jam Required Specific Controls And Those Were The Most Comfortable Ones For This Style Of Game.
